author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: A character who had to be present, and one whos presence greatly adds to the seriesâ€™ quality!
review:
Opening;

Wile E.Coyote is a Looney Tune who provides the role of villain and one of sympathy, but this minifigure provides neither, it provides quality.

The Minifigure-

He has a dual moulded exclusive head which brilliantly captures the character's likeness, a simplistic torso which shows his scraggly fur, a reddish brown werewolf tail and some simplistic reddish brown legs.

The accessory-

His only accessory is an anvil built with a dark grey colour scheme with a stamp piece handle and a cheese slope end. The stand is the standard black CMF stand.

 In conclusion-

This is another CMF great, the figure represents perfectly and even the brick built accessory is perfect, that's why I highly recommend this Minifigure.

author: Odeinoichus
title: An Unfortunate Genius
review:
Set #71030 Wile E. Coyote: Here we find Acme's biggest customer, purchaser of Flying Suits, Rocket Powered Skates, Cannons, Explosives and Giant Magnets with Magnetic Birdseed all for the express purpose to capture the Road Runner and have a decent meal.

Makes one wonder how he afforded everything from Acme, but failed to have enough to buy take-out. Anyway, questioning sixty-year-old cartoon logics aside, Wile E. as a Minifigure is a very impressive looking character. He features a brand new head sculpt with long ears and a crafty expression printed upon the face, has limited torso printing for detailing to match the animation model and includes a small buildable anvil. No doubt so he can cross a wire and pounce upon the unsuspecting Road Runner. Alas the anvil does not include ACME printing, which would have been a nice nod, but considering the elements used in its constructions I can see where that would be difficult to achieve.

This is a great looking addition to the Minifigure collection from Warner Brothers, the head sculpt is superbly handled and looks brilliant. I would recommend this Minifigure for any fans of the character. Recommended.
